solution_line_template: The tree has been planted for {lydia_current_age} - {lydia_age_when_planted} = <<{lydia_current_age}-{lydia_age_when_planted}={years_tree_planted}>>{years_tree_planted} years

It will take another {years_to_bear_fruit_total} - {years_tree_planted} = <<{years_to_bear_fruit_total}-{years_tree_planted}={years_remaining_to_bear_fruit}>>{years_remaining_to_bear_fruit} years for it to bear fruit
